screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .embed file in Embed Notes
screenshot.caption: EMBED file open in Embed Notes

description: After creating an account and logging in to Embed Notes, users can create, edit, and save any number of notes, which include a header and body text. To save a note locally, users click Embed Notes' download button. They can then save the note as either a .PDF or EMBED file.
An EMBED file lists a note's ID, title, and text at its beginning. The text is separated into paragraphs. The file then goes on to list other formatting associated with the note, such as its font.

images.caption: EMBED file open in Embed Notes
